tooltipText: At MAPLE, people are key. We want to foster a community as each person provides public testimony to empower policy change. By providing more information about yourself, it helps legislators and others see what your goals are and connect in an impactful way.

legislator.findToolTip: and select your State Representative and Senator.

testimonies.editTip1: Editing testimony is allowed but users will be able to see edit history.
testimonies.editTip2: Provide an edit reason to inform your fellow users on why you changed a particular stance/message.
